##  QQnorm plot on gpu
```{r }
library('gpuR')
setContext(   grep('PpenCL 2.1', listContexts()$platform)[1]    )
```



```{r eval=TRUE}
y <- rt(256, df = 5)
Nglobal = c(4,16)
gpuRandom::qqnorm(y, mu=0, sigma=1, workgroupSize = Nglobal )


```
